answers.answer: Absolutely.  Everyone is different.  Some can be very sensitive to insulin (I've heard of 1 unit of fast acting dropping someone's blood sugar by 80 points, or on the other hand quite insulin resistant - 1 unit of insulin to drop by 5 points, and everything in between).

question: Can some type 1 diabetics be more sensitive than others? excluding reasons like weight, diet, exercise etc.
title: Type 1 diabetes and insulin sesitivity.
